modName: Bards Sing in English Russian Japanese French German Spanish Italian Polish
summary: Bards sing in English, in Russian, in Japanese, in French, in German, in Spanish, in Italian or in Polish.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/headers/15774.jpg[/img]
[size=5][b]Bards Sing in English Russian Japanese French German Spanish Italian Polish[/b][/size] [color=grey]by ossram[/color]

[color=green][size=3][u]This project is finished[/u][/size][/color]

[color=green][size=3]All languages are available for download: [/size][/color]
[list][*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/us.gif[/img] - English (v2.01en (30.10.2014));[/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/ru.gif[/img] - Russian (v2.01ru (30.10.2014));[/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/jp.gif[/img] - Japanese (v2.01jp (30.10.2014));[/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/fr.gif[/img] - French (v2.01fr (30.10.2014));[/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/de.gif[/img] - German (v2.01de (30.10.2014));[/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/es.gif[/img] - Spanish (v2.01es (30.10.2014));[/*][/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/it.gif[/img] - Italian (v2.01it (30.10.2014));[/*]
[*][img]http://tactics.indians.ru/pic/flags/pl.gif[/img] - Polish (v2.01pl (30.10.2014)).[/*]
[/list]

[youtube]uonVMlNx8Rk[/youtube]

[size=4][b]1. [u]Description[/u][/b][/size]

This program replaces all songs of the bards in game to original English, Russian, Japanese, French, German, Spanish, Italian or Polish and fixes some bugs.

The program does not modify the original packed files and can be removed any time.

[/list]

[/list]
[size=4][b]3. [u]Install[/u][/b][/size]

[b]3.1. Archive with .bsa and .esp files[/b]

For install, unzip the archive with mod "* Bards Songs v* by ossram-15774-*.zip" into the Data folder of the game.

[b]3.2. Installation file[/b]

For install, unzip the archive with mod "* Bards Songs v* by ossram-15774.zip" into the some folder, run the installation file "TES V Skyrim. * Bards Songs v* by ossram.exe" and follow the instructions.

[color=red][b]Be careful![/b][/color]
If the installer does not detect the location of your game in the disk, you must set it yourself.


[size=4][b]4. [u]Uninstall[/u][/b][/size]

[b]4.1. Archive with .bsa and .esp files[/b]

For uninstall, delete files "* Bards Songs v* by ossram.bsa" and "* Bards Songs v* by ossram.esp" from Data folder of the game or unmark mod in the launcher.

[b]4.2. Installation file[/b]

For uninstall, run the file "Uninstall TES V Skyrim. * Bards Songs v*.exe" in the root folder of the game and follow the instructions.

[color=red][b]Be careful![/b][/color]
The uninstaller program can remove some files of other mods that change the voices of bards, if they was installed after this program.


[size=4][b]5. [u]Incompatibility and problems[/u][/b][/size]

Different languages are incompatible with each other. Don't install more than one Bards Songs.

Mod can be incompatible with other mods that change the voices of bards.

Older versions of the mod may work incorrectly with unofficial software for the game from third-party authors.

[color=red][b]Be careful![/b][/color]
The program can overwrite other mods that change the voices of bards.


[size=4][b]6. [u]Other[/u][/b][/size]

The original file is located on the next webpage: [url=http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15774]http://nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15774[/url]


[size=4][b]7. [u]Other my projects[/u][/b][/size]

[b]7.1. The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim[/b]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15774][img]http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/headers/15774.jpg[/img]
[size=5][color=white][b]Bards Sing in English Russian Japanese French German Spanish Italian Polish[/b][/color][/size] [color=grey]by ossram[/color][/url]

[b]7.2. Others[/b]

No description.
